title: Degenerate Eulerian polynomials and numbers
abstract:
The aim of this paper is to study degenerate Eulerian polynomials and
degenerate Eulerian numbers, respectively as degenerate versions of the
Eulerian polynomials and the Eulerian numbers, and to derive some of their
properties. Specifically, we derive an identity, recursive relations,
generating function and degenerate version of Worpitzky's identity for the
degenerate Eulerian polynomials and numbers. In addition, we obtain several
results involving the degenerate Stirling numbers of the second kind and the
degenerate Bernoulli numbers as well as the degenerate Eulerian numbers.
